body_html:
parameterized_ci_build script is something we are planning to get rid of. And the dockerfile you are editing at the moment is just to make sure we do not break our build with CUDA 9 and cudnn 7.
Soon we are planning to upgrade out main dockerfiles and get rid of this extra file. Therefore I think an edit to this file at the moment is unnecessary.

body:
parameterized_ci_build script is something we are planning to get rid of. And the dockerfile you are editing at the moment is just to make sure we do not break our build with CUDA 9 and cudnn 7.
Soon we are planning to upgrade out main dockerfiles and get rid of this extra file. Therefore I think an edit to this file at the moment is unnecessary.
